articles.content:

articles.content: Mafia II: Definitive Edition launched on PlayStation 4 yesterday (at the time of writing) and... Well, let's just say that it leaves a lot to be desired. This is a remaster of Mafia II, which launched on PS3 all the way back in 2010. It's the same game, but i… [+1386 chars]

articles.description: Google Pixel 4a rumoured to be scrapping the squeeze that activated Google Assistant.
articles.content:

articles.title: PUBG's new Ranked Mode is now live for ladder climbing enthusiasts - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Update 7.2 for PUBG brings a brand new Ranked Mode queue separate from unranked matches. Oh yeah, and bots are dropping in too.
articles.content: Update 7.2 for ye olde Playerunknown’s Battlegrounds has landed hot on the live servers and it’s coming with some changes that are likely to rock the boat a bit. Despite PUBG Corp calling them a “controversial topic,” non-player AI contestants are dropping in… [+1863 chars]

articles.title: Laughable security flaws identified in NHS contact tracing app - Android Central
articles.description: The NHS' contact tracing app has been found to have a number of security flaws, including the fact that the random ID used to protect privacy only changes once every 24 hours.
articles.content:
A security report based on source code analysis of the NHS' contact tracing app has revealed several serious security flaws in the software.
As reported by Business Insider:
The UK government's contact-tracing app has got a number of serious security flaws … [+3077 chars]

articles.title: Facebook Avatar: How to make your very own Facebook avatar emoji - Express
articles.description: FACEBOOK'S new avatars have taken the world by storm, with people posting their custom-made emojis to the social media platform in the absence of physical interaction. How do you make your own Facebook avatar?
